    some att in input.attestations

instruction: Retrieve the bundle reference for task 'sast-unicode-check'
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

bundle_ref := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "sast-unicode-check"
    ref := task.ref.bundle
} else := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "sast-unicode-check"
    some param in task.ref.params
    param.name == "bundle"
    ref := param.value
}
